methods. 'B0/3' is short for SegFormer-B0/3. 'Seg' denotes Seg-
mentor, 'Ref' denotes Refiner. '400', '600', '512' denote the de-
fault input size required by different models. The speed is mea-
sured on a CPU laptop with 2.4 GHz, 4?Intel Core i5.

Table 4. Quantitative results on DAVIS-585 benchmark. The metrics 'NoC' and 'NoF' mean the average Number of Clicks required and 
the Number of Failure examples for the target IOU. All models are trained on COCO [26]+LVIS [13].

Table 5. Ablation studies on both interactive segmentation from 
scratch and interactive mask correction. 'TC', 'FC', 'PM' denote 
Target Crop, Focus Crop, and Progressive Merge. 'NoC', 'NoF' 
stand for the Number of Clicks and the Number of Failures.
